document.title: DBD
document.intro: The Dutch Bilingual Database (DBD) is a rather substantial collection of data (over 1,500 sessions) from a number of projects and research programmes that were directed at investigating multilingualism and comprises data originating from Dutch, Sranan, Sarnami, Papiamentu, Moroccan(-Ara... DBD overall tcult
